select * from storeReview where storeCode = #{storeCode} order by storeReviewNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into storeReview (storeReviewNum , storeCode , memberId , storeReviewScore , storeReviewText , reviewDate , savedFilename) values (storeReviewNum_seq.nextval , #{storeCode} , #{memberId} , #{storeReviewScore} , #{storeReviewText} , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') , #{savedFilename})

insert into menuPreference (menuPreferenceNum , memberId , menuNum , weather , ageGroup , companion , event) values (menuPreference_seq.nextval , #{memberId} , #{menuNum} , #{weather} , #{ageGroup} , #{companion} , #{event})
